content:
Sure, here's the updated pricing list with the changes you've requested:

* Audiovisual Portions: $1050
	+ Includes: Visual Portion and Audio Portion, and a 20-30 minute video
	+ Includes: 3 meetings and revisions
* Other formats (e.g. VR, 360 video, etc.): Additional services and additional meetings will incur additional costs.

Total: $1,200 (for 3 meetings and standard format)
